summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1739, for the improvement of the alley in block 45, A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading and paving the same with asphalt, including all water mains, sewers and appurtenances necessary for the proper water service, fire protection, sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 18471 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
